website_summaries.verdict: Contains all 8 B vitamins as well as biotin in a quick-dissolving chewable tablet.
pros: Good choice for those who can't swallow large pills
Tablets are soy-, dairy-, and preservative-free
Supports energy, metabolism, and hair, skin, and nail health
Users are pleased that these don't upset their stomachs, unlike other B supplements
cons: Need to take 3 tablets per day to reach 100% RDA of some vitamins
Contains real coconut, so not an option for those with tree nut allergies

customer_reviews.title: They are CHEWABLE!
customer_reviews.text: I like the ingredients list including the fact that there is a huge dose of biotin.... but nowhere on the bottle or in the description do they mention They are CHEWABLE! It only says “fast dissolve” but I just thought that meant you would swallow it like a pill and it would be absorbed into your body quickly. Also nowhere in the description or on the bottle is there a picture of what the tablet actually looks like. That would have tipped me off because it is a large disk (like a Tums) so I would have realized it was chewable.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing flavor!
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! Chewable vitamins b that taste GREAT! Maybe not so great if you don't like coconut, but I do and I hate the smell and taste of all vitamins b. That smell permeates everything! But not these!! No big smell-faintly coconut. Wonderful taste. And it's good for you!
customer_reviews.author: Sekmet

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Im very happy with this vitamin purchase. More complete ingredients than competition. Does not upset my stomach like others old fashion tablets. They are quite potent for me so I only take half at a time. I hope Natrol keeps expanding this line of quick dissolves.
customer_reviews.author: Coyot21

customer_reviews.title: A good option for B complex
customer_reviews.text: Another great option for a chewable/fast dissolving B complex vitamin that doesn't taste terrible or bitter. Has a pleasant taste and seems to have good nutrient value. The other alternative I tried was the Bariatric Advantage B Complex chewable in Berry Flavor - this was an incredibly bitter/acidic tasting vitamin. Very tough to chew and swallow without a lot of water. I like the taste of the Natrol B-complex, it is smooth and non-acidic. A great option for a vitamin B complex.
customer_reviews.author: Acadia93

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I have had to take vitamin B's for years and at times even injections, I have trouble swallowing pills, these are chewable and taste amazing. I actually look forward to taking them. Hard to find, so happy to find on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Berry

customer_reviews.title: B vitamin
customer_reviews.text: Value for the product was a good price, I need to take extra B vitamin so I was happy that my husband bought them for me, had to get use to the flavor; again he did not realize they were dissolvables/coconut flavor, so I will definitely be doing the ordering next time.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting Flavor
customer_reviews.text: These taste so horrible the person who needs them will not take them. they taste terrible when they melt and are too big to swallow easily.
customer_reviews.author: Shiratha

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: You have to take 3 a day, they are big, and I don't think they taste great. They do taste like coconut, so just my preference probably. They also take a very long time to dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: chloe a.

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful B vitamin! I recommend trying for yourself and loved ones!
customer_reviews.text: The coconut flavored B-complete is a literal lifeline for me and the flavor is not overpowering at all. I personally have a many health problems including but not limited to malabsorption and these wonderful vitamins help to keep me going on a daily basis.
customer_reviews.author: diane fenwick

customer_reviews.title: Terrible coconut flavor.
customer_reviews.text: I usually like coconut flavor but this tastes terrible. The tablet is fairly large and the normal dose is 3 tablets a day. I decided to try this because the strawberry flavor of this brand tastes pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jp

customer_reviews.title: TWO Bottles
customer_reviews.text: My order should have come with (2) Bottles - only came with ONE!!!
customer_reviews.author: stablern

customer_reviews.title: Just Like Coconut Candy!
customer_reviews.text: These taste amazing. I actually use these to satiate my need for sweets sometimes. I do feel a boost of energy when taking these over time. You must be a coconut lover for these.
customer_reviews.author: Honest MacGyver

customer_reviews.title: Large pills!
customer_reviews.text: These pills are large round saucer-shaped tablets. Not a problem if you are dissolving them in your mouth, but if you are swallowing with a handful of others, they can be troublesome getting down. Great coconut flavor!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin White

customer_reviews.title: Great dissolvable B vitamins
customer_reviews.text: Loved this as they are dissolvable. Only thing is the flavor wasn’t to my liking
customer_reviews.author: Cassie Palomino

customer_reviews.title: thanks
customer_reviews.text: its what I need and its hard to find in the stores.
customer_reviews.author: marsha

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I usually just take one a day and my b vitamins all show that they are in normal range!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Cheater

customer_reviews.title: We love the dissolving tablets
customer_reviews.text: My grandmother loves the dissolving tablet instead of swallowing a pill. I order Natrol vitamins B & D that dissolve. I love using other Natrol products that dissolve too, like melatonin & biotin.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Taste good and easy to take
customer_reviews.text: These taste good and are easy to take. I recommend to anyone who dreads taking big horse pills.
customer_reviews.author: T.Toscano

customer_reviews.title: excellent product been using it for yrs now and will ...
customer_reviews.text: excellent product been using it for yrs now and will continue....been taking B complex for yrs have tried other brands, continue to go back to this one, feel the results.
customer_reviews.author: Jazzer

customer_reviews.title: It tastes great.
customer_reviews.text: I have trouble swallowing pills so a chewable is ideal for me.
customer_reviews.author: ariana

customer_reviews.title: Inadequaye Low daily requirements
customer_reviews.text: Should have read label better. Provides low levels of most B vitamins. Will have to take at least 2 or 3
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Loud coconut flavor
customer_reviews.text: Very coconut! The flavor in this is NOT subtle. Most of my family loves this vitamin. One of my sons prefers the regular tab because he doesn't like coconut.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Gave them away
customer_reviews.text: I liked this companies chewable B12 so I ordered these. The artificial sweetener they used left an after taste I did not care for.
customer_reviews.author: Bren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased and will buy again if needed. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: ValueRays

customer_reviews.title: a good supplement,but look out if you have prostate issues
customer_reviews.text: it is a good test. boost, works good, but it effected my prostate. i have an enlarged prostate, and some supplements effect it, and this is one of them,for someone who does not have that problem it would work good, so i give it 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: mozell house

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in small pieces
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. However I will have to throw half of it away. It arrived in small pieces or powdered.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor! Didn’t realize your suppose to take 3 a day!
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Gammie

customer_reviews.title: Love the coconut flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Love the coconut flavor and fast dissolve. Wish they made more supplements with this flavor and fast dissolve.
customer_reviews.author: Tara PM

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Makes me feel energized all day, great flavor
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Curwick

customer_reviews.title: Tasty & works great for bariatric patient
customer_reviews.text: Tasty and works great. I'm a bariatric patient and these really help with my energy levels, and keep my B12 levels right where they need to be!
customer_reviews.author: Paula E. Woodrum

customer_reviews.title: I love Natrol Brand!!
customer_reviews.text: I use Natrol Brand and they help me a lot. The price is more affordable, buying through Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: HARMONIE ROTH

customer_reviews.title: Good B Supplement
customer_reviews.text: This is the same B supplement I've been buying from my local health food store for years. I really like it, and it's much cheaper on Amazon. I prefer the capsules. More bio-avaiable.
customer_reviews.author: Misha's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It taste good and I don't even like coconut flavor
customer_reviews.text: It taste good and I don't even like coconut flavor...
customer_reviews.author: BS

customer_reviews.title: Tasty B-Complex
customer_reviews.text: Tasty fast dissolve tablets are great. An easy way to get my B-complex vitamins.
customer_reviews.author: tulipgal1223

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Not packaging.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, but half of the tablets were broken in the container. It shipped in a plastic bag, but these need to ship in a box for added protection.
customer_reviews.author: bmcmanus

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: A large number of the tablets are broken in the bottle when I opened it.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Provides energy even on my worse days.
customer_reviews.text: Very fast delivery. Product dissolves fast. Pleasant taste. Provides energy even on my worse days....the ones that seem unending.
customer_reviews.author: Onerib

customer_reviews.title: Capsule is too thick
customer_reviews.text: I believe this is a perfectly fine formulation of B-Complex. However, the capsules are far to thick for me to be able to swallow - frequently sticking in my throat, then causing a severe burning sensation in my esophagus which can only be alleviated by forcing the capsule down or bringing it up. If you have a problem swallowing large capsules, this one isn't for you.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Glosser

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for B Vitamin
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand. These particular tablets are a little bigger than I prefer, but the flavor is good and I like the fast dissolve option. They provide energy with the B vitamins, and are an economical choice.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Good deal for the amount your getting and it's good quality, I got a niacin flush from taking too many (not dangerous just makes you feel hot) so you know it actually works. It's also very tasty. It breaks down quickly in your mouth and you can even chew it to dissolve quicker.
customer_reviews.author: John Lucky Schaeffer

customer_reviews.title: Great Supplement.
customer_reviews.text: The flavor of these is good and they are very easy to chew.
customer_reviews.author: R. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Taste good
customer_reviews.text: These taste good, melt quickly, and do not bother my stomach. I cannot tell a difference in energy, hair, or nails yet: but I will update in a month. I am certain the addition of these vitamins cannot hurt anything.
customer_reviews.author: roberta bowers

customer_reviews.title: B Complex good value and taste good
customer_reviews.text: Even though you must take 3 pills a day, the value is still good and company is good.
customer_reviews.author: J. Perez

customer_reviews.title: Would not buy again
customer_reviews.text: The tablets were so large they would not dissolve and were too hard to chew
customer_reviews.author: bjhaught

customer_reviews.title: great taste to me
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste, it's like eating candy to me, quick dissolve is the important reason to buy this product, I don't like to take any pills with water
customer_reviews.author: bechidethuong

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Delicious flavor and has helped me with neuritis pain.
customer_reviews.author: Mora

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRICE BUT WAY TOO BIG TO SWALLOW !
customer_reviews.text: These tablets are HUGE and are very difficult to swallow, causing sticking in the digestive tract and irritation of the esophagus and intestinal tract.
customer_reviews.author: F. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these vitamins!! They taste so good I never forget to take them.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Tasty and easy to take
customer_reviews.text: I have been taking these for a while as I transition my hair from relaxed to natural. It's hard measure the growth while doing so. They are easy to take and tastes good. I have told many friends about it and made them buy it lol
customer_reviews.author: Maymay

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Excellent choice for getting my B-complex while on the go. And good flavor too!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Bravo

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Taste is a bit chalky.. But, overall - ;pretty good!! i would recommend.. Price is very reasonable and free returns!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M.

customer_reviews.title: ... because otherwise I wouldn't continue to order them I liked them very much
customer_reviews.text: As You can see they do the job because otherwise I wouldn't continue to order them I liked them very much.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Taste good!!just like coconut not chalky!!
customer_reviews.text: Dissolved fast tastes really good!!not chalky at all!! Gonna order another!!

customer_reviews.title: Have glass of water ready
customer_reviews.text: I'm certain the supplement works as specified. Taste? That's another story.
customer_reviews.author: M. Castronova

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste!
customer_reviews.text: I love these, easy to take, fast dissolve, great taste!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product... Tastes good, has a nice flavor, and it seems to be working positively for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hitesh

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to digest, and tasty, too!
customer_reviews.text: These Fast Dissolve Tablets are wonderful. They do not upset my stomach the way capsules and polished tablets always do.
customer_reviews.author: Lilac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice coconut taste in a chewable tablet but a funky after taste
customer_reviews.author: Huma

customer_reviews.title: No more trying to gag a pill down
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time swallowing pills- these are so awesome! They taste good and dissolve in just a couple of minutes, will re-purchase for sure.
customer_reviews.author: janicez

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Tastes good, dissolves easily. Works well. Will definitely be ordering again. Thank you! Try it you will like it
customer_reviews.author: jward

customer_reviews.title: this one TASTES GOOD..
customer_reviews.text: I have spent AGES looking for a B-complex that doesn't STINK ... this one TASTES GOOD ... and I have to have my B+ ... I love it!
customer_reviews.author: judlbug

customer_reviews.title: No wonder I am feeling like crap. I have chronic disease and need not ...
customer_reviews.text: I am so upset, I cannot return these vitamins, I bought several types in fast dissolve format and they contain wheat. No wonder I am feeling like crap. I have chronic disease and need not have wheat hidden in vitamins. I wasted money, and this is not a warning on label, very hard to see, and I now have to deal with all the side effects of this damn vitamin.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: I love Natrol!
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive to get a chewable vitamin, but these are tasty...light coconut flavor with a nice sweetness, but not too chalky.
customer_reviews.author: Stina

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite taste or texture
customer_reviews.text: While I do like this brand of supplement- the coconut flavor is kind of meh for me. Will definitely be trying a different flavor in the future. Ilove coconut but not in a dissolving tablet.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Iles

product_meta.title: Natrol B-Complex Fast Dissolve Tablets, Coconut flavor, 90 Count
product_meta.description:
Size:90 Count (Pack of 1)

Natrol B-Complex contains biotin and multiple B vitamins that help support a healthy nervous system. One of the leading ingredients in our B-complex fast dissolving tablets is biotin, an important nutrient not only for hair, skin and nails but also to help convert food into energy.* Natrol B-Complex contains all B vitamins, helping to support energy throughout the day. Our B vitamins also function as cofactors for enzymes essential to healthy cell function.*

Enjoy Natrol B-Complex anytime you need an extra boost of energy. The biotin and other B vitamins work to assist in the natural production of energy.* Vitamin B also plays a vital role in supporting the central nervous system, brain health, and skin and cellular health.

*These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease.
feature_bullets: PROMOTES ENERGY: Natrol B-complex includes a combination of B vitamins and other nutrients that may help boost energy.*
PACKED WITH BIOTIN: Biotin, a B vitamin also known as vitamin H or Vitamin B7, is an important nutrient not only for hair, skin and nails but also to help convert food into energy.*

CONTAINS ALL B VITAMINS:  Contains all eight (8) of the chemically distinct B vitamins to help in maintaining healthy immune function, muscle tone, metabolism, skin and eyes, as well as many other bodily functions.*
EASY TO TAKE: Natrol B-Complex fast dissolve tablets come in a great tasting coconut flavor and can be taken anytime, anywhere, no water needed.
